com.gv.port.logging

Class PortLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gv.port.logging.PortLogger

  • public class PortLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    logger class that realized Singleton pattern. Uses log4j library for logging and holds last log info from ships threads

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String shipIdInFirstDock
